Class RegistrationRepository

java.lang.Object
RegistrationRepository
public class RegistrationRepository extends Object
Entity.

This RegistrationRepository handles the storage and retrieval of registration data for officers and projects. Provides utility methods to query, filter, and modify the registration list.

      Returns:
      list of pending Registration objects

    • hasPendingRegistration

      public static boolean hasPendingRegistration(Officer officer, Project project)
      Checks if an officer has a pending registration for a given project.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer to check
      project - the project involved
      Returns:
      true if a pending registration exists, false otherwise

    • hasRegistration

      public static boolean hasRegistration(Officer officer, Project project)
      Checks if an officer has any registration for a given project.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer to check
      project - the project to check
      Returns:
      true if any registration exists, false otherwise

    • hasSuccesfulRegistration

      public static Registration hasSuccesfulRegistration(Officer officer)
      Returns a successful (approved) registration for the given officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer to check
      Returns:
      the approved registration if found, null otherwise

      Returns:
      list of registrations with the given status
